value:
I'm rather curious about your
summoning capabilities... All I've ever
been able to summon are monsters.

I was raised in the Deeprealms. It was
nice. Dark, gloomy... The perfect
place to carry out my research.

Oh, $Nu.
Tell me if you start feeling drowsy.$k$pWhy? Oh, I made you my test subject
for a hex. It's supposed to make you
nice and...cheery.

Usually I find white too blinding to look
at, but your outfit is oddly bearable...
Maybe we can chat again sometime.

I was raised in a place where time
flows differently. By this world's flow, I
should technically still be an infant...

I was entrusted with a greeting for you
from $Nf.$k$pI consider a message a type of spell...
The type that can bind two hearts
together.
Oh, this will come in handy...
How boring.
I must be cursed.

Hmm, good choice... You know
me so well.

It's good to meet you. I am Rhajat...
daughter of the diviner Hayato.$k$pAnd I certainly won't object to helping
someone like you...

Heehee... You're talking with me
again. I'm keeping a count of all the
times we've spoken.$k$pBut the exact number is my little
secret, of course...$k$pIt's been a while since I arrived in this
world, and I'll be honest... It took
some getting used to.$k$pThe sun is too bright, and everything
is just so...pretty.$k$pBut ever since you started spending
time with me, it feels like I've been
cursed with...kindness.$k$pSomehow, I've come to like this
place.$k$pThat's why I'll fight alongside you to
protect this world. Well, and because
I'd like to keep watch over you...$k$pThat's all I wanted to say. Now I'll go
back to waiting around until you come
chat with me again—so don't be shy.$k$pSee you soon... Heehee...
Take that...
Like this?
ううっ…
I'll curse you...
Let's see what this does!
Hope you like hell!
You deserve it.
You're still here?
I won't forget this...
Uhuhu...
It must be fate that brought me here.
My father is such a child...
I was raised in a Deeprealm...but I'm also a member of the Wind Tribe.
Is there anybody here I can experiment on? Uh, I mean any FACELESS here. Right.
You...remind me of someone. Definitely.

I wish it were more comfortable around here.
It's too bright, and too...dry.
I have an idea for a new hex. If you want, I'll make it for you. I'm not sure why, but I want to help you.
It's Rhajat.
My turn?
All right...
